ygData.subject: RE: Root?
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I tested out Accelerando vs root and it still works.  I still can see the root Icon but I can move. Syren Wind of Rathe ... From: John Kim
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I tested out Accelerando vs root and it still works. I still can
see the root Icon but I can move.

Syren Wind of Rathe

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Friday, July 30, 1999 4:14 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Root?


From: John Kim <kim@...>

Has anyone tested Accelerando and Chain since the latest patch
to see if they still break root? A druid site was reporting
that snare no longer does, which would imply Chain won't. But
what about Accelerando?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
